hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Plandomizer is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be... unnatural.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Bow#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #Deku Nut Capacity# and #a Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ Compass Chest
Bottom of the Well MQ Dead Hand Freestanding Key
